DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy esomeprazole 20 mg daily 24 week maintenance Reflux Esophagitis patient heal reflux esophagitis comparison omeprazole 10 mg daily esomeprazole 10 mg daily assessment presence/absence recurrence Reflux Esophagitis throughout treatment period ( randomisation treatment completion ) accord Los Angeles classification .
DOC.brief_title: Reflux Esophagitis Phase III Study ( Maintenance Treatment )
DOC.criteria: Patients heal Reflux Esophagitis verify EGD precede study ( D961HC00002 ) Patients endoscopically verify heal Reflux Esophagitis EGD receive general treatment PPI Gastric duodenal ulcer verify EGD within 12 week randomisation .
